body: Thanks, Abraham! It seems that the PMV calculator cannot accept a whole year analysis period specified through the **analysisPeriod** component. (I understand that the PMV calculator does whole year calculation by default if no input is specified for its analysisPeriod_ node) Might this be a bug (i mean a programming bug :) of the PMV calculator component? a non-whole-year analysis period specified through analysisPeriod component works fine with PMV calculator: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/NQ48wH9Dt2RcDSE0uHvUBywdAbAYmd6PwUzhEA6ynAjMgk-FpoDCKqInb04o2kkTAFNabv7HlFxV92lao83q559P6juG5vzn/01.PNG) But a whole year analysis period specified through analysisPeriod component doesn't work with PMV calculator: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/NQ48wH9Dt2T9QNO-lP8FnT4QFC-T6zgDGPtAhrHtxlDFx1p-SBwJ1yMPxnTDV2Cjj6a9-g1P6sGT5YFywKNqAjoKxfe4Bn6R/02.PNG)
